amendment.description: To strike the authorization of appropriations and the additional child pornography amendments.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4819 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4819 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S4838-4839; text: CR S4839) To strike the authorization of appropriations and the additional child pornography amendments.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4819 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Stevens.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4819 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
